Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to demonstrate sound moral and ethical principles at work. Ability to display and apply moral judgment and character, honesty and leadership values
Description: Models professionalism and commitment.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to demonstrate sound moral and ethical principles at work. Ability to display and apply moral judgment and character, honesty and leadership values
Description: Supports an environment of trust by admitting own mistakes and taking responsibility for ones actions

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to demonstrate sound moral and ethical principles at work. Ability to display and apply moral judgment and character, honesty and leadership values
Description: Establishes open and honest communication with others.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to take initiative and assume risk to create value for the organisation. Ability to display commitment and passion for their work.
Description: Continues to improve processes, questioning current models and identifying areas of improvement.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to take initiative and assume risk to create value for the organisation. Ability to display commitment and passion for their work.
Description: Strives to develop own capabilities in order to ensure he/she has the skills required to achieve organisational objectives.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to take initiative and assume risk to create value for the organisation. Ability to display commitment and passion for their work.
Description: Stays updated on industry practices and innovations and tries to implement new ideas in order to improve performance and delivery.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to interface productively with other colleagues and work jointly towards the organisational goals.
Description: Effectively works with others to ensure successful accomplishment of goals /tasks.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to interface productively with other colleagues and work jointly towards the organisational goals.
Description: Respects people with diverse backgrounds, and embraces differences for better decision making.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to interface productively with other colleagues and work jointly towards the organisational goals.
Description: Models cooperation and team work by creating opportunities for self and others to improve working relationships and work outcomes.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to be rational in working style and taking smart risks. Being open to possible failure and keeping oneself nimble by minimising complexity and finding time to simplify. Ability to accomplish more with less.
Description: Has high levels of ownership and accountability by being execution focussed to ensure quality delivery on time.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to be rational in working style and taking smart risks. Being open to possible failure and keeping oneself nimble by minimising complexity and finding time to simplify. Ability to accomplish more with less.
Description: Minimises complexity in processes by simplyfying tasks to achieve end objective.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to be rational in working style and taking smart risks. Being open to possible failure and keeping oneself nimble by minimising complexity and finding time to simplify. Ability to accomplish more with less.
Description: Maintains composure and direction in stressful situations.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to work on some of the most challenging problems around; ability to contribute to creating a work environment that drives enthusiasm for our work. Ability to provide care and support to fellow colleagues.
Description: Creates a work environment that promotes positivity and enthusiasm.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to work on some of the most challenging problems around; ability to contribute to creating a work environment that drives enthusiasm for our work. Ability to provide care and support to fellow colleagues.
Description: Seeks to develop a relationship of trust and respect with others at work.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to work on some of the most challenging problems around; ability to contribute to creating a work environment that drives enthusiasm for our work. Ability to provide care and support to fellow colleagues.
Description: Embraces challenging & ambiguous projects/problems with resilience, positivity and self-motivation.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability and willingness to learn from experience and apply that learning to perform successfully in new situations. Ability to remain open to new ways of thinking and to continuously learn new skills.
Description: Reflects and learns from own experiences and those of others.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability and willingness to learn from experience and apply that learning to perform successfully in new situations. Ability to remain open to new ways of thinking and to continuously learn new skills.
Description: Shows ownership of own professional growth by keeping abreast of new information and advancements in order to improve performance.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability and willingness to learn from experience and apply that learning to perform successfully in new situations. Ability to remain open to new ways of thinking and to continuously learn new skills.
Description: Displays the ability to unlearn traditional practices in order to improve performance.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to communicate effectively, listen effectively and interact with other team members of the organisation, employing emotional intelligence skills
Description: Displays conviction in expressing own views.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to communicate effectively, listen effectively and interact with other team members of the organisation, employing emotional intelligence skills
Description: Role models effective listening by keeping an open mindset and being attentive to the speaker.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to communicate effectively, listen effectively and interact with other team members of the organisation, employing emotional intelligence skills
Description: Is able to use emotional intelligence when interacting with team members across the organisation.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to readily respond and willingness to adapt to changing circumstances and expectations
Description: Asks questions and looks for data that helps to identify the symptoms of defined problems.

Question: Q02
Statement: Ability to readily respond and willingness to adapt to changing circumstances and expectations
Description: Identifies the root causes of problems and ensures that the knowledge created is used to inform future ways of working.

Question: Q03
Statement: Ability to readily respond and willingness to adapt to changing circumstances and expectations
Description: Probes underlying issues to generate multiple solutions.

Question: Q01
Statement: Ability to analyse a problem objectively, identify problem severity and assess the impact of alternative solutions. Ability to identify problems, brainstorm alternatives through critical thinking, considering the facts and differing perspectives and making decisions on the basis of thorough analysis and implementation of the solution.
Description: Articulates view points with conviction in a logical and compelling manner.

Statement: Ability to analyse a problem objectively, identify problem severity and assess the impact of alternative solutions. Ability to identify problems, brainstorm alternatives through critical thinking, considering the facts and differing perspectives and making decisions on the basis of thorough analysis and implementation of the solution.

Statement: Ability to analyse a problem objectively, identify problem severity and assess the impact of alternative solutions. Question: Q01

Description: Implements strategic objectives and develops metrics to assess atttainment of goals/OKRs.

Description: Conducts reviews and gathers information from relevant sources to support the development of a strategic plan.
